p: By combining the advantages of fast high-resolution chromatographic separation with the high-sensitivity, selectivity, and specificity of mass spectrometric detection, UPLC-MS became the technique of choice for a wide range of applications ( Pitt, 2009; Hummel et al., 2011; Want et al., 2013).
